nickname.question: What do you want to be called?

business.question: Have you ever owned a business or otherwise supported a free market economy? (yes/no)

risk.question: Are you willing to do anything the government asks of you, even risking life and limb? (yes/no)

loyalty.question:
Repeat after me:
>>> I pledge my heart and soul to the gulag and my fellow comrade. Long live the supreme dictator!
loyalty.answer: I pledge my heart and soul to the gulag and my fellow comrade. Long live the supreme dictator!
